content: the length of the entire strap the strap is a total of 10 stitches wide and will be a total of 15 inches long or the length you want join strap to other side by single_crochet 10 times around loops & into the last row of stitches on the strap use darning needle to weave in your ends © charlotte yarn pattern free at shop with purchase of yarn only please do not copy or distribute pattern without permission of pattern designers
